__e: Only now, she has a baby girl of her own, and your existence in their lives puts them in constant danger.
Angry at the whole world, at war with her father and brother... never mind the father, with her boyfriend or her ex...
I just have a different kind of relationship with my friends where we don't need to be in constant contact with each other.
I mean, yeah, I'm rich and attractive, but does that mean that people should constantly be trying to shit on me? Does it?
You know, whenever I'm around her I feel like I constantly have to prove to her that I deserve to be around her.
What's funny about her constantly, relentlessly, trying to break us up?
I mean, when you're constantly getting shot at, the last thing you're thinking about is sex.
Everyone just needs me to get better so bad. It's like this pressure.
Stuff, and I think he needs my help to get out of it, but I've been under so much pressure, and I know you've always told me to be there for people...
